casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 6, 2014

[Cite as 05/06/2014 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-1905.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2012-1786. State ex rel. Richmond v. Indus. Comm.

Franklin App. No. 11AP-771, 2012-Ohio-4412. This cause came on for further consideration upon the *1488filing of Walter Kauffman’s motion to withdraw as counsel for appellant. It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
